about_the_game:
The Intern - OST
19 Tracks - MP3 Format.

The Intern - 01 - Intro Battle Track.
The Intern - 02 - The Guardian Battle Intro.
The Intern - 03 - The Guardian Battle.
The Intern - 05 - Elite Four.
The Intern - 06 - Trip
The Intern - 07 - Parararam!
The Intern - 08 - Magical Place.
The Intern - 09 - BUS!
The Intern - 10 - Game Over ...
The Intern - 11 - Funny Theme!
The Intern - 12 - level up!
The Intern - 14 - Introdution.
The Intern - 15 - Myst...
The Intern - 16 - ???.
The Intern - 17 - ??? continues.
The Intern - 18 - Sorrow intro.
The Intern - 19 - Sorrow continues.
The Intern - 20 - Jazz café.
The Intern - 21 - "Her".

The Track 04 and 13 doens't exist. D= Why? (It's a secret.)
